channel.title: 667 Disturbed / Matrix [Re - Release]
channel.description:
Thanks to anonymous1 we all got to play around with "Matrix" server since the pots in wildy / pvm didn't work here is a fix version :] for people who haven't gone this far :)
Also client comes without the matrix logo :D
Quick tut section if you wish to change little things on the server Click this link... [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0.html[/url] post any problems u come across
[b][size=18pt]Note: You must have jre/jdk7 to run this! Enjoy[/size][/b] :)
if ur computer is a 64bit change the run.bat files
[b][size=10pt]Client 64bit run[/size][/b]
@echo off @title Disturbed "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause
[b][size=10pt]Server 64bit run[/size][/b]
@echo off title Disturbed 704 echo starting... "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause
[b]People who think there is "rat" or bugs/ keyloggers in this server can go away this will not be closed till there is complete proof your using this base and where the keylogger/rat is till then shut up and be great full for what you have, leechers can leech i don't care.
Any more flaming on this thread will be reported any more accusations without proof will be reported have a nice day.[/b]
[b]Download links:[/b]
[b]Matrix v8 original source[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?33bqmqn3828486z]http://www.mediafire.com/?33bqmqn3828486z[/url]
[url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/70pnnf]http://www.sendspace.com/file/70pnnf[/url] = Cache [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?33bqmqn3828486z]http://www.mediafire.com/?33bqmqn3828486z[/url] = Server [url=http://uppit.com/8hq5f5t1ru93/Disturbed_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/8hq5f5t1ru93/Disturbed_Client.rar[/url] = Client re uploaded no backdoor or rats in it look for yourself
Here is another cache link thanks to WowILikeToCode for making a mirror :) [url=http://uppit.com/bgs6absaztbx/cache.rar]http://uppit.com/bgs6absaztbx/cache.rar[/url]
[b][size=10pt]Ok to setup:[/size][/b] - download all 3 links. - next, create a folder name it anything u want - extract both the source and client into that folder - once you have done this, extract the cache into 'Disturbed server\Server\data\cache' (if there isn't cache folder in data) make a folder called 'cache' and extract the cache into it. - after this try running the server (source) and the compiler, and play around with the jdk/jre depending on your java. - DO THIS FOR SOURCE ONLY@#$ - After this both should run, allowing you to login :) = working 667 on your pc.
[b]Disturbed v2.2 Tradefix[/b]
[url=http://uppit.com/4747mi3xlnns/Disturbed_server_v2.2.rar]http://uppit.com/4747mi3xlnns/Disturbed_server_v2.2.rar[/url]
Updates are: 1>Farming,Mining,Woodcutting,Crafting,Herblore and Rares shop 2>Taken out Starter tutorial so you don't get 99's 3>Added a 500k cash starter 4>Made R.S Webclient look 5>item command only for players whit the privilege not for admins/mods or normal players 6>Trade fix
Photo of shops...
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230276/crafting.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230295/farming.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230298/herblore.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230318/mining.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230323/rare_shop.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2230346/webclient_design.png[/img]
[size=14pt]So once again thanks to anonymous1, matrix team and sickpack from rune-server for help.[/size]
Re Released the server because people keep spamming my inbox for it don't ask for help with changing the ip ect use google if you use it give credits to people ill keep links live for people

item.title: 667 Disturbed / Matrix [Re - Release]
item.dc:creator: @Evi Evi
item.description:
@Evi wrote:

Great server and everything but I’m a noob when it comes to coding. I’ve got a couple of issues I’d like to fix and here they are:

  • How do I disable spawn rights for everyone but Mods/Admins/Owners/Etc.?
  • How do I enable dicing/flowers on the server?
  • How do I activate the “bloom” effect on the graphics panel?

Thanks and hopefully someone can help me out with these issues

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Disturbed / Matrix [Re - Release]
item.dc:creator: @Dmxrb Dmxrb
item.description:
@Dmxrb wrote:

[quote=“Eaffon, post:133, topic:443311”][quote author=Dmxrb link=topic=545998.msg4052984#msg4052984 date=1342684136]

Arunkumar Prabakar (Listening) Arunkumar Prabakar: Hi, my name is Arunkumar Prabakar. How may I help you? Rodney ballard: hellow im trying to portforward Rodney ballard: but everytime i do my router restarts and gives my pc a new ip Rodney ballard: so i tryed setting up a static ip but my isp dont support static ips in my area Rodney ballard: is there a way to get one up via my router Arunkumar Prabakar: alright may i know the model number of the router? Rodney ballard: f9k1102v1 Arunkumar Prabakar: what is the the color of the lights on the belkin Rodney ballard: blue Rodney ballard: and amber when it dont have internet running through it i think Arunkumar Prabakar: connect the modem the belkin yellow slot Rodney ballard: >.> my modem is connected Rodney ballard: my internet works Rodney ballard: i just want to make my ip address not change so i can port forward and work on a server Rodney ballard: atm i have a dynamic ip i need static my isp only provides dynamic so i need my router to make a static connection with a dynamic ip like a dns server Rodney ballard: like no-ip.org Arunkumar Prabakar: may i know how is your Internet service provider Rodney ballard: time warner Arunkumar Prabakar: may i know the ip address on the the computer? Rodney ballard: the current isp one or the 192 one Arunkumar Prabakar: with time warner the ip is 192.168.2.1. Rodney ballard: **.**.***.*** is isp one the one for the pc set by router is 192.168.2.10 Rodney ballard: the 192.168.2.1 is the gateway ip.... Arunkumar Prabakar: alright connect the router to the computer. Rodney ballard: can i speak to someone that knows what they are talking about please? Arunkumar Prabakar: yes i understand that the ip address's on the computer changes when ever you resrtart the computer,because this router has the dynamic Nat so that it changes the ip ,we have to assign static ip on the computer . Rodney ballard: ok the computer is connected to the internet. i have set the ip as static via 192.168.2.10, i portforwarded port 43594. i type that port in on canyouseeme.org Rodney ballard: and it says port is closed Rodney ballard: meaning portworwarding isnt working correctly or my static ip isnt set up correctly Arunkumar Prabakar: that's why we have to hardwire the computer to the belkin so that we can access the router setup page we can open the ports on it Rodney ballard: it is hardwired Rodney ballard: i have the router setup page open Arunkumar Prabakar: alright now on the left hand side you will find dmz please click on it Rodney ballard: i have went into virtual servers and typed in the forwarding info Rodney ballard: wow Rodney ballard: dmz opens all ports and is currently set up for my ps3 Arunkumar Prabakar: and enter the ip on the dmz also please Rodney ballard: it would leave my pc unprotected Arunkumar Prabakar: no you have to enter the ps3 ip on dmz Arunkumar Prabakar: because it has nat in it and its already has the firewall on it Rodney ballard: my ps3 is in dmz wired im not using my ps3 to host a server im using my pc Arunkumar Prabakar: its already in the ports are forwarded so to enable it we can use in dmz Rodney ballard: Error: I could not see your service on **.**.***.*** on port (49594) Rodney ballard: thats with dmz Arunkumar Prabakar: have you disabled the firewall on the router page? Rodney ballard: no Rodney ballard: yes Rodney ballard: it is disabled Arunkumar Prabakar: now please disconnect and reconnect on the ps3 and try connecting Rodney ballard: im not using a ps3 Rodney ballard: can you read english? Arunkumar Prabakar: i am Sorry Rodney on which device that error occurs Rodney ballard: my computer Arunkumar Prabakar: are you trying to use any game or any software? Rodney ballard: im trying to host a server Rodney ballard: for a game so my friends can connect and play with me Arunkumar Prabakar: may i know the name of the game? Arunkumar Prabakar: so that i can provide the port numbers for that game Rodney ballard: ****** ** Rodney ballard: u wont have the port numbers Rodney ballard: i can provide them though Arunkumar Prabakar: just give me a moment rodney so that i can find it . Rodney ballard: 43594 tcp&udp Rodney ballard: you cant find it it isnt a game that has been published Arunkumar Prabakar: TCP- 3074 ,53,80 UDP-88,3074,53 Arunkumar Prabakar: TCP- 80,443,5223,10070-10080 UDP- 3478,3479,3658,1070 Rodney ballard: what are you talking about? Arunkumar Prabakar: try opening these ports Rodney ballard: why Arunkumar Prabakar: we have to open those ports also we can try opening these ports Rodney ballard: the ports i provided are the ones that need open they are coded into the source i can make the ports whatever i want them to be Rodney ballard: can i please chat with someone that understands the english language Arunkumar Prabakar: alright we have our 24x7 technical sup[port so that we can fix this issue so please call us 1800-223-5546 Rodney ballard: kk thx ima go burn my belkin and get a linksys

dont contact belkin support they are useless.

can someone please add me on skype if they can help with this problem. my skype is dmxrb89
[/quote]

I was having the same problem. What you do is go to your routers page. Then go to LAN setup. After that assign a reserved address to your computer. That should work.

Now onto my problem. I added all of the bonuses to items, but how do I make it so that every npc I spawn doesnt have 1 hp?[/quote]

i have 5 or more deices conected to my router and it dont seem to support individual ip reservations unless im missing something. i may use a vps if u can find one.
trying to find one good enough to run 2 servers with 2 ips one for me playing with this server and the other for friend

Read full topic
